post.summary: Export an existing drawing to BMP format with export settings specified.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filename of an input drawing on a storage.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Export BMP options passed as a JSON on a request body.

parameters.name: folder
parameters.description: Folder with a drawing to process.

parameters.name: outPath
parameters.description: Path to updated file (if this is empty, response contains streamed file).

200.description: Data stream (if output path is not set).

400.description: Invalid request parameters or input data.

404.description: Input file doesn't exist at provided path.

500.description: Either current server is busy or internal error occured.

501.description: The specific operation is not yet supported - please, contact us if you require it.

put.summary:
Export drawing to BMP format. Drawing data is passed as zero-indexed multipart/form-data as well as export BMP options serialized as JSON.
Order of drawing data and BMP options could vary.

parameters.name: outPath
parameters.description: Path to updated file (if this is empty, response contains streamed file).

parameters.name: exportOptions
parameters.description: JSON-serialized export options passed as zero-indexed multipart/form-data. Follow #/definitions/BmpOptionsDTO model definition.

200.description: Data stream (if output path is not set).

400.description: Invalid request parameters or input data.

500.description: Either current server is busy or internal error occured.

501.description: The specific operation is not yet supported - please, contact us if you require it.

parameters.name: rotateFlipType
parameters.description: Rotate/flip operation to apply. Possible values: RotateNoneFlipNone, Rotate90FlipNone, Rotate180FlipNone, Rotate270FlipNone, RotateNoneFlipX, Rotate90FlipX, Rotate180FlipX, Rotate270FlipX, RotateNoneFlipY, Rotate90FlipY, Rotate180FlipY, Rotate270FlipY, RotateNoneFlipXY, Rotate90FlipXY, Rotate180FlipXY, Rotate270FlipXY

200.description: The raw data of the file.

401.description: Authorization token is invalid or expired.

404.description: File for given path not found.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description:
Path where to upload including filename and extension e.g. /file.ext or /Folder 1/file.ext
            If the content is multipart and path does not contains the file name it tries to get them from filename parameter
            from Content-Disposition header.

200.description: Empty error list if the upload is successful.

401.description: Authorization token is invalid or expired.

200.description: Returns 200 if the delete is successful.

401.description: Authorization token is invalid or expired

200.description: Returns 200 if the copy is successful.

401.description: Authorization token is invalid or expired.

200.description: Returns 200 if the move is successful.

401.description: Authorization token is invalid or expired.

404.description: File for given path not found.

get.summary: Get all files and folders within a folder

200.description: Returns all files and folders contained by the folder.

401.description: Authorization token is invalid or expired.

404.description: Can't find folder for given path.

200.description: Returns 200 if the create is successful.

400.description: Storage not found or it is not associated with the application.

401.description: Authorization token is invalid or expired.

parameters.name: recursive
parameters.description: Enable to delete folders, subfolders and files

200.description: Returns 200 if the delete is successful.

401.description: Authorization token is invalid or expired

200.description: Returns 200 if the copy is successful.

401.description: Authorization token is invalid or expired

parameters.name: destPath
parameters.description: Destination folder path to move to e.g '/dst'

200.description: Returns 200 if the move is successful.

401.description: Authorization token is invalid or expired.

200.description: Storage exist result.

401.description: Authorization token is invalid or expired.

get.summary: Check if file or folder exists

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: File or folder path e.g. '/file.ext' or '/folder'

200.description: Object exist result.

401.description: Authorization token is invalid or expired.

200.description: Disc usage.

400.description: Storage not found or it is not associated with an application.

401.description: Authorization token is invalid or expired.

200.description: File versions.

401.description: Authorization token is invalid or expired.

AutomaticLayoutsScaling.description: Determines whether layout has to be scaled automatically

NoScaling.description: Determines whether scaling has to be turned off

BorderX.description: Gets or sets the border X.

BorderY.description: Gets or sets the border Y.

PageHeight.description: Gets or sets the page height.

PageWidth.description: Gets or sets the page width.

BackgroundColor.description: Gets or sets a background color.

DrawColor.description: Gets or sets a foreground color.

ContentAsBitmap.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether content of a drawing is represented as image inside Pdf. Applicable only for CAD to Pdf export. Default is false.

GraphicsOptions.description: Gets or sets options to render bitmap inside pdf (if ContentAsBitmap is set to true).

DoPaletteCorrection.description: Determines whether to do auto-correction of a palette

IsPaletteSorted.description: Determines whether a palette is sorted

HasTrailer.description: Determines whether image has to have a trailer

Interlaced.description: Determines whether an image has to be interlaced

BitsPerPixel.description: Bits per pixel for Resulting file

Height.description: Gets or sets the height of a drawing.

Width.description: Gets or sets the width of a drawing.

DwgProperties.description: Gets or sets the DWG properties.

DxfProperties.description: Gets or sets the DXF properties.

DwtProperties.description: Gets or sets the DWT properties.

DgnProperties.description: Gets or sets the DGN properties.

IfcProperties.description: Gets or sets the IFC properties.

IgsProperties.description: Gets or sets the IGS properties.

StlProperties.description: Gets or sets the STL properties.

DwfProperties.description: Gets or sets the DWF properties.

Cff2Properties.description: Gets or sets the CFF2 properties.

Value.description: Files and folders contained by folder StorageFile.

IsFolder.description: True if it is a folder.

ModifiedDate.description: File or folder last modified DateTime.

Exists.description: Indicates that the file or folder exists.

IsFolder.description: True if it is a folder, false if it is a file.

IsLatest.description: Specifies whether the file is (true) or is not (false) the latest version of an file.
